title: ARCH 591
names: Special Problems in Architectural History and Theory
intro: Examines historical and/or theoretical problems in the history of architecture, the built environment, and related designed objects and arts in relation to emerging, interdisciplinary research. Topics can include thematic investigations of historical, conceptual, aesthetic, and theoretical problems; the work of particular architects and/or patrons; specific buildings or environments in a single or multiple geographic regions or periods.
